faqs.question: Могут ли иностранцы купить недвижимость в Испании?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Foreign nationals enjoy identical property purchase rights as Spanish citizens—no residency requirements, visa restrictions, or ownership limitations exist. EU citizens, Americans, Australians, Canadians, and citizens of most countries purchase property freely throughout Spain. Legal procedures remain straightforward with professional conveyancing support, and mortgage lending is available to international buyers with established income documentation.

faqs.question: Каковы расходы на покупку недвижимости в Испании?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically total 6-10% beyond property price, including: property transfer tax (ITP) 6-8% of purchase price, notarial fees (approximately 0.5%), land registry fees (approximately 0.5%), and legal representation (typically €1,000-2,500). This property at €529,000 would involve approximately €31,740-52,900 in total acquisition costs. Professional property advisors manage these procedures seamlessly, and costs are significantly lower than UK equivalents.

faqs.question: Какова стоимость жизни на Коста-Бланке?

faqs.question: Как далеко Коста-Бланка от России?
faqs.answer: Direct flights from major UK airports (London, Manchester, Birmingham, Bristol) to Alicante require 2.5-3 hours flight time. Connections occur multiple times daily through budget carriers (Ryanair, EasyJet, Wizz Air) and traditional carriers, with return fares typically €40-120. This proximity enables regular UK visits while maintaining Mediterranean residence—a primary attraction for retired professionals and second-home investors.

faqs.question: Какая погода на Коста-Бланке?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca delivers Mediterranean climate excellence: 300+ days annual sunshine, average temperatures 18°C (winter) to 28°C (summer), minimal rainfall concentrated in autumn-spring months, and moderate sea breezes moderating summer heat. The climate supports year-round outdoor activities—beach swimming June-September, golf throughout the year, outdoor dining from April-October. Seasonal variation remains gentle, eliminating the extreme weather challenges affecting northern European alternatives.

faqs.question: Могу ли я получить ипотеку в Испании как иностранец?
faqs.answer: Yes, numerous Spanish banks and international lenders provide mortgage financing to foreign property buyers. Standard requirements include proof of income, professional employment verification, and down payment of 20-30%. Interest rates remain competitive with UK equivalents (currently 3.5-4.5%), and repayment terms extend to 30 years. Many lenders provide English-language documentation and specialized services for international borrowers. Professional mortgage brokers facilitate the application process seamlessly.
